@RealJamesWoods Covid-19 Scott's USA unofficial update 4/10
Cases 501,272 (+35,273 from yesterday) up 7%
Recovered 27,239 (+1923) 5.4% unchanged
Deaths 18,666 (+2092) 3.7% up .2
1% increase in death since 4/4
deaths exceeded recoveries since 4/8
